Name: The Bomb
Ingredients: 45 ml Lustau Amontillado Los Arcos Sherry
Instructions: Select and pre-chill a Coupe glass .
Prepare garnish of orange zest twist.
EXPRESS orange zest twist over the cocktail and use as garnish.
Review: A sherry-led aperitif cocktail. Don't be put off by its murky appearance.
History: Adapted from a recipe in Stan Jones' 1977 Jones Complete Bar Guide .
Nutrition: One serving of The Bomb contains 113 calories
